description: This file contains the implementation of the MainActivity class for an Android application. It manages the display of notes, including search functionality, and handles user interactions such as adding and editing notes.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity displaying a list of notes with search, add, and edit capabilities.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, and binds event listeners.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Reloads the notes list when activity resumes, considering current search query.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads notes from the repository based on the search query and updates UI accordingly.

methods.name: onNoteClicked
methods.description: Handles note item clicks, launching the edit note activity with the selected note's ID.
